mapper.insert: insert into product(product_name, product_manufacturer, product_price, product_stock, product_point, product_seller, product_score, category_code) values (#{product_name}, #{product_manufacturer}, #{product_price}, #{product_stock}, #{product_point}, #{product_seller}, #{product_score} ,#{category_code})
mapper.select: select product_code, product_name, product_manufacturer, product_price, product_score from product
select count(*) from product where category_code=#{category_code}

select p.product_code, p.product_name, p.product_manufacturer, p.product_seller, p.product_price, p.product_stock, p.product_point, p.product_score, c.category_code ,c.category_name from product as p join category as c on p.category_code = c.category_code where p.product_code = #{product_code}
mapper.update: update product set product_name = #{product_name}, product_manufacturer = #{product_manufacturer}, product_price = #{product_price}, product_stock = #{product_stock}, product_stock = #{product_stock}, category_code = #{category_code} where product_code = ${product_code}
